    A class detailing an Uber driver
    Author:
    max

    • Method Detail

      • addRating

        public void addRating(java.lang.Integer rating)
        Adds a rating to this drivers list of ratings.
        Parameters:
        rating - The value of the rating you will add to this drivers list of ratings.

      • acceptRequest

        public void acceptRequest()
        To be called when the driver has taken a Passenger, and cannot take other Passengers.

      • endTrip

        public void endTrip()
        To be called when the driver has finished with a Passenger, and wishes to become available again.

      • available

        public boolean available()
        Returns the availability of this driver.
        Returns:
        True if the driver is available to take Passengers, false otherwise.

      • getRating

        public double getRating()
        Takes the average from the list of ratings of this driver.
        Returns:
        The average rating of this driver

      • askDriver

        public boolean askDriver(Trip trip)
        Asks a driver specified by driver to accept a trip specified by trip.
        Parameters:
        driver - The driver you will ask to accept a ride.
        trip - The trip you will retrieve information about the ride from
        Returns:
        True if the driver accepts, False otherwise.
